text: "Peggy Sue" is a 1957 song by Buddy Holly. It was taken from his album Buddy Holly. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Canada, number 5 in the Netherlands and number 9 in Belgium. ==References== Category:1957 songs Category:Buddy Holly songs Category:The Crickets songs Category:The Beach Boys songs Category:John Lennon songs Category:The Hollies songs Category:Waylon Jennings songs Category:Rockabilly songs
title: Peggy Sue
